author: adrianc
msg: Created a SOAP serializer facade class to decouple SOAP code from XmlSerialize.

author: ajaquith
msg: Changed a few classes that depend on Stripes to use "lazy initialization." WikiContextFactory and StripesURLConstructor must lazily initialize because they depend on StripesFilter being initialized first. Cleaned up TestEngine also: it now initializes a full mock Stripes filter stack at startup.

author: ajaquith
msg: Fixed bug in TemplateResolution that prevented some JSPs from resolving.

author: ajaquith
msg: Eliminated WikiRuntimeConfiguration: it is no longer needed because WikiEngine can easily be obtained without needing a special Stripes config class. Less classes are always better.
